verses.roman:
dine kṛṣṇa-kathā-rasa bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge
rātre mahā-mahotsava saṅkīrtana-raṅge

synonyms: dine—during daytime; kṛṣṇa-kathā-rasa—discussion on Kṛṣṇa; bhakta-gaṇa-saṅge—with the devotees; rātre—at night; mahā-mahā-utsava—a great festival; saṅkīrtana-raṅge—in the matter of congregational chanting.
translation: During the day the devotees discussed subject matters concerning Kṛṣṇa, and at night there was a great festival of congregational chanting at the house of Advaita Ācārya.
